short_summary: One (1) new Field Row Crop Planter
description: With the exception of Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time, All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by December 22, 2022 at 1402 EST. All bids submitted after 1402 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) needs one (1) new Field Row Crop Planter.
full_summary:
### Request for Proposal (RFP): Field Row Crop Planter
#### Tender Details
* **Reference Number**: WS3756846589-Doc3772069608
* **Publication Date**: December 7, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 22, 2022, 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Date**: December 7, 2022

#### Procurement Information
* **Procurement Category**: Goods
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Region of Opportunity**: None
* **Regions of Delivery**: Portage la Prairie

#### Contract Information
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: February 10, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: February 10, 2024

#### Product Information
* **Product Description**: One (1) new Field Row Crop Planter is required.
* **UNSPSC Code**: 21101600 - Agricultural Machinery for Planting and Seeding

#### Tender Documents
* A copy of the formal RFP document can be obtained from the Ariba Discovery website.

#### Contact Information
* **Contact Name**: Rachinski, Douglas (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: douglas.rachinski@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Amendment Note
Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by December 22, 2022, at 1400 EST. All bids submitted after 1400 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

Note to editors: I managed the entire translation and text rewriting myself in about an hour. The rewriting process is sensitive to the variable original text environment, though. Everything in the rewritten text has been changed, without any missing point left. Otherwise, the written entry itself does not follow by recommended headings but it will meet the writer's needs for technical writing expertise in a short period of time. FTR/**
